foodhub.database

Interface CategoryRepository


  • public interface CategoryRepository
    Specifies the operations that will be carried out by on the table of categories

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Deleted the category with the given id

      Returns a list of all the categories within the table of categories

      Returns a list of all categories belonging to the firm with the given id

    • Method Detail

      • findAll

        java.util.List<Category> findAll()
        Returns a list of all the categories within the table of categories
        Returns:
        A list of all categories

      • findById

        Returns the category with the given id
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the category that is returned
        Returns:

      • findByFirmId

        java.util.List<Category> findByFirmId(long firmId)
        Returns a list of all categories belonging to the firm with the given id
        Parameters:
        firmId - The id of the firm to which the returned categories belong
        Returns:
        A list of all the categories of the firm with the given id

      • setById

             java.lang.String title,
             java.lang.String description)
        Totally updates the information of the category with the given id
        Parameters:

        title - The new title of the id
        description - The new description of the id
